website_summaries.verdict: An LED-light illuminated ant farm that creates a beautiful new spin on a classic habitat.
pros: Enjoyed by both kids and adults
LED lights on the bottom of the farm create a much-admired blue glow
Translucent nutritional gel contains all the food and water ants need while also making them easy to observe
Comes with a 50% off ants coupon
Doubles as a great night light
cons: Some reviewers prefer a more classic, dirt ant farm
Don’t place this in direct sunlight

customer_reviews.title: Ant holocaust...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was the ants that we ordered, or the gel ant farm that I bought only a couple of weeks before, but... it was horrible. The ants just walked around confused until one-by-one they died. They never seemed to understand that they could eat the gel, they dragged their dead family members to the corner, they started digging a little, but all died in a couple of weeks. It was terribly disappointing and depressing.
customer_reviews.author: MCatherineC

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second gel ant farm and while we loved our first one, this time we're highly disappointed. It arrived and looked as expected. When our ants arrived they were fine and thrived for the first few days but suddenly stopped tunneling. I contacted the ant supplier, and was told these gel farms can get old, expire, go out-of-date, whatever you want to call it. So our poor ants are just sitting in the corner of the habitat in a big "ant pile" doing nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This set up is pretty cool. I am using it in my Pre-K class and they are completely fascinated with it. We use the magnifying glass to see the ants during our circle time (and they can use it throughout the day). My own children like coming into my class in the morning before school and checking them out. I may get one for them for our home too. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect the ants to do much
customer_reviews.text: Followed instructions, but the ants wouldn't tunnel. They made one small tunnel, then just sat on the surface dying off. They didn't seem to like the gel.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Penrose

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I like the lights on the bottom--it creates ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I like the lights on the bottom--it creates a beautiful glow in which to watch the ants! There was a gap in the gel down one side. The ants don't seem to mind-they crawl down the gap and seem to be starting a tunnel from there as well as on top. The container was sticky when it arrived, but a wipe down cleared that up with no problems. Very nicely packaged, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Tramel

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: It was much smaller than i envisioned. And the ants died off pretty quickly in the blue gel. The few that lived have thrived in the dirt we replaced the gel with. But overall it was HUGE hit with my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Giddens

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea but our ants never did any tunneling
customer_reviews.text: All our ants have died after 4 weeks and not a single ant did any tunneling😩
customer_reviews.author: josie brandt

customer_reviews.title: Fun blue ant farm
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining. Kids and I love watching the ants. Only issue is the plug for the LED light is obstructed by the tank itself so the connection is loose and the light tends to go off and on. Propped the cable up with an army man to keep the connection in.
customer_reviews.author: Liselle Moses

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is super cool. Has had my attention, maybe a little too much, as I'm finding myself watching these guys as opposed to doing much of anything else :) My ants, which are ordered separately, started building tunnels within 6 hours. Will definitely buy again. Makes a great and unique gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The habitat is Awesome, I quite honestly did not expect much for ...
customer_reviews.text: The habitat is Awesome, I quite honestly did not expect much for the price but I am pleasantly surprised on how much I love this thing. I especially love the lights it is such a beautiful blue color I love love love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Won by one

customer_reviews.title: Very educational
customer_reviews.text: I got the ant farm for my grandson who is autistic and loves observing things. He loves it. He spends hours watching let me out. Just a heads up. Took quite a while to get the ants.
customer_reviews.author: susies mom

customer_reviews.title: Great ant farm!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ant farm for my daughter for Christmas last year. It is July and we still have living ants! Easy to assemble & easy to take care of. The only maintenance is to open the air hole once a day so the ants will get fresh air. I would highly recommend this ant farm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift. This is what it looks like outside of the box. The kiddo I got it for absolutely loves it, the lights illuminate as pictured in the ad. It’s an awesome gift for kids who are interested in animals/science.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and easy to set up. The ants are making a hill out of the gel.
customer_reviews.author: Waxhaw

customer_reviews.title: It’s all fun and games until they die
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say that after a week our ants are dead. They tunneled well for a few days then they just stopped and died. My kids are sad and I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was such an awesome buy. It came as described and was delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fun time with my nephew!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew really enjoyed this!! It is good quality and beautiful to watch at night. It was pretty easy to set-up and we had a blast watching the ants dig away :)))))
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: Awful purchase, lights stop working about two days after we bought it and there is no way ants can live in this. Out of our ants, which we had well over twenty all died within days. Ants need dirt, waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: A new spin on a classic.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to find the habitat pretty much ready to go upon arrival. The habitat is a nice size and the illumination is really neat. We've had our ants in for almost an hour and they are quite active. We're excited to watch their progress.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: ... ants get to work and the blue color is fun along with the light
customer_reviews.text: It is neat to see the ants get to work and the blue color is fun along with the light.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 6 year olds Christmas present. Our entire family is fascinated by the ants. The product is well made. We definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LCB

product_meta.title: ANTARTISTS Gel Ant Farm w/ LED Light Ant Coupon. All About Ants and Observation Journal Included. Educational Observatory for Kids & Adults. Learning Science Kit.
product_meta.description:
Introducing Our Spectacular Illuminated Gel Ant Observatory! 

This beautifully illuminated, turquoise blue gel ant habitat is a fun way for children and adults to learn about the fascinating behavior of ants! The nutritional gel not only makes it easy to observe the ants but also contains all of the food and water the ants need to survive. The LED lights encourage the ants to dig deeper and beautifully highlight the intricate network of tunnels left by your ants. It also acts as a stunning night light that casts a soothing wash of neon blue across the room. Perfect as a bedside, desk or shelf accent light. 

Everything is Ready to Go and Easy to Set Up 

It is easy to get started! Inside the package are detailed instructions, a magnifying glass for observation and even an exclusive 50 percent off coupon with detailed instructions to easily order your live ants. Observe as the ants take on different roles. Some ants will dig tunnels, while others guard the surface or groom each other. There is so much to learn by observing the daily behavior of ants. 

Friendly and Easy to Contact Support 

We believe that children should learn by doing and we pride ourself in providing high-quality educational toys for your child. If you have any problems with your product, we are here to help. Simply contact us via your Amazon order page and we promise to make it right!
feature_bullets: TRANSLUCENT NUTRITIONAL GEL FOR UP-CLOSE OBSERVATION: The enhanced gel not only makes it easy to view the ants but also contains all of the food and water the ants need to survive.
SPECTACULAR LED LIGHTS: Its beautiful LED lights provide nighttime observation and also encourage the ants to dig deeper and more intricate tunnels.
EXCLUSIVE 50% LIVE ANTS COUPON AND EVERYTHING YOU NEED: With our discounted ants coupon, a magnifying glass and detailed instructions, you have everything you need to get started.

ALL ABOUT ANTS PAMPHLET AND ANTS OBSERVATION JOURNAL INCLUDED: Included is an "All About Ants" pamphlet which allows you and your child to learn about what you are observing right in front of you. Also included is an Ants Observation Journal so your child can draw and record their ants day to day progress.

FAST, FRIENDLY, DEDICATED SUPPORT: We try hard to provide high quality educational products for children to learn while doing! If you have any problems, our friendly team is easy to contact and promise to solve any problem you may have!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
